statements: SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND patient_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, LENGTH(patient_record) AS record_length FROM Patients WHERE LENGTH(patient_record) > 0 ORDER BY record_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='M';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, COUNT(*) FROM patients GROUP BY patient_name, patient_age HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC, patient_id
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'M' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
SELECT * FROM medical_records INNER JOIN patients ON medical_records.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE patients.patient_age < 30
SELECT record_id, record_date, record_type FROM medical_records WHERE record_type IN ('Lab Result', 'MRI Scan') ORDER BY record_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, patient_diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_diagnosis ILIKE '%cancer%'
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob <= '2000-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob >= '1980-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_specialty DESC;

SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.record_date FROM Doctors INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Doctors.doctor_id = MedicalRecords.doctor_id INNER JOIN Patients ON MedicalRecords.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE Patients.patient_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, doctor_speciality FROM doctors WHERE doctor_speciality = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_status FROM appointments WHERE appointment_status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_dob < '2000-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_speciality FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_speciality DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, prescription_date FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id ORDER BY prescription_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM patients;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, hospital_id FROM doctors WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, date_created FROM medical_records ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY birth_date DESC, patient_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date, encrypted_data FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM doctors JOIN hospitals ON doctors.hospital_id = hospitals.hospital_id;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, date_created FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%';

SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
